hadiths.english_translation: He was called by that name because of a choking/obstruction in his throat. Son of Yazid ibn Shidad ibn Qinan ibn Salamah ibn Wahb ibn 'Abdullah ibn Rabi'ah ibn al-Harith ibn Ka'b from Mudhaj. His father Shihab ibn al-Husain killed the killer of his father al-Husain on the Day of al-Razm. Kathir ibn Shihab was the chief of Mudhaj in Kufa and was stingy. He narrated from 'Umar ibn al-Khattab and governed ar-Ray for Mu'awiyah ibn Abi Sufyan. From his descendants was Muhammad ibn Zuharah ibn al-Harith ibn Mansur ibn Qais ibn Kathir ibn Shihab who settled in Mashbadhan and also governed Mashbadhan and had status in Baghdad during the time of Harun
